text: Fausto Bertinotti (born 22 March 1940) is an Italian politician. He led the Communist Refoundation Party (Partito della Rifondazione Comunista) from 1994 to 2006. On 29 April 2006, he was elected President of the Chamber of Deputies, a position he held until 2008. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of the Chamber of Deputies (Italy) Category:Politicians from Milan Category:MEPs for Italy Category:Italian communist politicians
